components/faceted-search/selected-facet:
{{lang 'search.faceted.selected.title'}}
{{#if this.items}}

    • {{/each}}
{{else}} {{lang 'search.faceted.selected.no-filters'}} {{/if}} {{#if remove_all_url}} {{lang 'search.faceted.selected.clear-all'}} {{/if}}

{{#each this}}

    • {{/each}}
